name: Wizard Duel
description:
A two-player game where each player controls a wizard and they're trying to kill each other with spells. Combine two elements to create and utilize up to 9 spells.

Player One Controls:

Q - Ice, W - Fire, E - Storm, R - Create Spell, F - Move to the other position, Space - Cast Spell

Player Two Controls:

Y - Ice, U -Fire, I - Storm, O - Create Spell, L - Move to the other position, Enter/Return - Cast Spell
